summary: An email from August 24, 2022, referencing a dead body in Derby, CT, identified as Stephen Hoffenberg, who is described as an Epstein whistleblower. The sender appears to be with the New Haven FBI and is requesting a callback.

persons.name: Stephen Hoffenberg
persons.context: Identified as a dead body found in Derby, CT, and described as an Epstein whistleblower.

events.title: Report of Stephen Hoffenberg's death
events.description: An email is sent reporting a dead body in Derby, CT, identified as Stephen Hoffenberg, an Epstein whistleblower.

keyFacts: Stephen Hoffenberg, identified as an Epstein whistleblower, was reported dead in Derby, CT on or before August 24, 2022.
The communication originates from someone associated with the New Haven FBI.
The document is an email dated August 24, 2022, referencing case file EFTA00156568.
